Blackwood Gardens Services

If your outdoor space isn’t working for you and you don’t know what to do about it, then Blackwood Gardens can help. We provide a full design service and work with quality landscapers to transform your outdoor space.

Our expertise is in creative problem solving, we listen to what you need and come up with solutions to turn an unloved, unruly or uninspiring garden into a space for you to love and enjoy.
